channel.title: ZenithScape 667/728 Store that buys anything?
channel.description: How do u add a store that buys anything to zenithscape? skype - cody.lavi please message me :/

item.title: ZenithScape 667/728 Store that buys anything?
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

I’m not entirely sure as I’ve not really worked with 667 revisions. From what I know have you tried to spawn a NPC of your choice and then type ::coords or ::mypos depending on the command added. Once you’ve done that add it to shops.cfg - I’m probably not right but there’s no harm in trying.

Google it if you still can’t work out how to do it, there’s a tutorial for almost everything you want added.

Read full topic
